column1: Traffic reports will resume Thursday May 26 at 6:30 a.m.

column3: Traffic Alert for Old Frankfort Pike at S Yarnallton Pike:
column4: The roadway is shutdown until further notice due to a downed pole and wires as a result of a collision.
River Park Dr at Armstrong Mill Rd
column5: One lane is blocked.  A tow truck is enroute.
